scripts.start:dev: pnpm web:dev & pnpm admin:dev & pnpm server:dev
scripts.web:deploy:dev: pnpm web:build:dev && aws s3 sync ./apps/web/dist s3://no-name-card-user-platform-web
scripts.web:deploy:prod: pnpm web:build:prod && aws s3 sync ./apps/web/dist s3://no-name-card-web-production
scripts.admin:deploy:dev: pnpm admin:build:dev && aws s3 sync ./apps/admin/dist s3://no-name-card-admin-platform-web
scripts.admin:deploy:prod: pnpm admin:build:prod && aws s3 sync ./apps/admin/dist s3://no-name-card-admin-production
scripts.docker:dev: docker build -f dockerfile.development -t ipe.development . && docker run -d -p 4000:4000 -v . ipe.development
